name: Cabot Technology Solutions, Inc
description:
Cabot Technology Solutions provides Product Engineering Services for Enterprise Mobile apps, Web Applications, IoT, & DevOps.  
Our experienced technical team is complemented by an equally strong management team who have spent more than a decade working across the US and Canada in a range of management and analysts capacities. Leveraging our experience, we quickly bring an appropriate context to your business requirements and deliver a sustainable IT solution. We professionally manage all our projects mitigating the business analysis and project management risks associated with offshore development. At Cabot, our clients are our partners. We believe in fewer more intimate client relationships and sustained organic growth in our business.
Key Technical Strength:
Angular, React, .NET Core, C#,  Node.js, Python
Data Analytics
Native and Hybrid iOS and Android app Development
QA Automation with Selenium and Appium
UI and UX Engineering
